creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: color image of a pale blue-grey and yellow door in an old exterior wall--wall is salmon-colored at top and blueish-grey at bottom on right side of door, salmon-colored to left of door, and a tan wall with crumbling losses at bottom at left; tiny red hatch/doorway, with "13 C" painted on it in black, to right of larger door
title: #2, from "Atlas Walls"
